author: Wayne Collins
method: Place all of the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with a handful of ice and shake hard.  Strain the cocktail into a highball glass, top up with cola and garnish with a lemon wedge.
ingredients: 15ml/½fl oz vodka,  15ml/½fl oz gin,  15ml/½fl oz  light rum,  15ml/½fl oz orange liqueur,  15ml/½fl oz fresh lemon juice,  15ml/½fl oz freshly squeezed orange juice,  1 tsp sugar syrup,  cola, to top up,  lemon wedge, to garnish
